timeline.bodyText: Before anyone comments on this part, Log4J doesn't seem to have a method for both {} params and throwable printing at the same time.
timeline.author: DaemonUmbra

replies.bodyText: Actually it does, I looked it up at one point, and it turns out log4j has "hidden" functionality that makes it treat it as such if it has one more passed to it than the parameters and is a throwable.
replies.author: pupnewfster

timeline.message: Adjusted to utilize the undocumented feature of using both {} and throwable printing in Log4j
